result.eng: Did you leave your wife at home tonight?
result.ga: ar fhág tú do bhean chéile sa bhaile anocht
result.orig: ar fhág tú do bhean chéile sa bhaile anocht
result.html: ar fhág tú do bhean chéile sa bhaile anochtDid you leave your wife at home tonight?
result.ponchtml: ar ḟág tú do ḃean ċéile sa ḃaile anoċtDid you leave your wife at home tonight?

result.eng: He introduced his new wife to us.
result.ga: chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinn
result.orig: chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinn
result.html: chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinnHe introduced his new wife to us.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé a ḃean ċéile nua in aiṫne dúinnHe introduced his new wife to us.

result.html: cá bhfuil mo bhean chéileWhere is my wife?
result.ponchtml: cá ḃfuil mo ḃean ċéileWhere is my wife?

result.html: dílis dá bhean chéileFaithful to his wife.
result.ponchtml: dílis dá ḃean ċéileFaithful to his wife.

result.html: thréig a bhean éHis wife left him.
result.ponchtml: ṫréig a ḃean éHis wife left him.

result.eng: I am separated from my wife.
result.ga: tá mé scartha ó mo bhean chéile
result.orig: tá mé scartha ó mo bhean chéile
result.html: tá mé scartha ó mo bhean chéileI am separated from my wife.
result.ponchtml: tá mé scarṫa ó mo ḃean ċéileI am separated from my wife.

result.ga: an bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bhean
result.orig: an bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bhean
result.html: an bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bheanDo you know my wife?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar mo ḃeanDo you know my wife?

result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ga: tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.orig: tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.html: tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ponchtml: tá mo ḃean ag coinneáil go maiṫ an baḃta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.

result.eng: It is a temporary position, but my wife is a nurse and that is a permanent position.
result.ga: is post sealadach é ach is banaltra í mo bhean agus is post buan é sin
result.orig: is post sealadach é ach is banaltra í mo bhean agus is post buan é sin
result.html: is post sealadach é ach is banaltra í mo bhean agus is post buan é sinIt is a temporary position, but my wife is a nurse and that is a permanent position.
result.ponchtml: is post sealadaċ é aċ is banaltra í mo ḃean agus is post buan é sinIt is a temporary position, but my wife is a nurse and that is a permanent position.

result.eng: My wife and our two children.
result.ga: mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúr
result.orig: mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúr
result.html: mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúrMy wife and our two children.
result.ponchtml: mo ḃean agus ár mbeirt ġasúrMy wife and our two children.

result.eng: His wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.
result.ga: tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla mí
result.orig: tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla mí
result.html: tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla míHis wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.
result.ponchtml: tá a ḃean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla míHis wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.

result.html: gortaíodh a bheanHis wife was injured.
result.ponchtml: gortaíoḋ a ḃeanHis wife was injured.

result.eng: Myself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ga: téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche aoine
result.orig: téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche aoine
result.html: téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche aoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ponchtml: téim féin agus mo ḃean ċéile amaċ fá ċoinne béile aċan oíċe aoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.

result.eng: I live in a detached house with my wife and my children.
result.ga: tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach scoite le mo bhean agus mo chlann
result.orig: tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach scoite le mo bhean agus mo chlann
result.html: tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach scoite le mo bhean agus mo chlannI live in a detached house with my wife and my children.
result.ponchtml: tá mé i mo ċónaí i dteaċ scoite le mo ḃean agus mo ċlannI live in a detached house with my wife and my children.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar ẛeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
